body:
Hey everyone! Sorry we are a little behind on the EULA changes. We are working on them as quickly as possible. A more "official" update will be posted soon enough.

For now, I have one major question to ask all of you players:
Would you like for there to still be leveling?
As of now, prestiging is purely cosmetic, and I would like for it to stay that way. This would allow donors to continue having their same perks. The only major difference would be the fact that leveling up wouldn't give you the opportunity to get kits (therefore leveling up faster is purely cosmetic). We would also add more prestiges, along with more stars and other symbols to show off. 
Also, this would allow everyone to keep their current level that they worked hard to get. There would be no resetting levels, which is my ultimate goal seeing that people have put hours upon hours into getting their prestige 5.

Comment below whether you would like to keep leveling, or whether you would like for it to be tossed. Your opinions do count! So please be specific on what you want!

Thanks, 
Max
body_tagged:
Hey everyone! Sorry we are a little behind on the EULA changes. We are working on them as quickly as possible. A more "official" update will be posted soon enough.

For now, I have one major question to ask all of you players:
Would you like for there to still be leveling?
As of now, prestiging is purely cosmetic, and I would like for it to stay that way. This would allow donors to continue having their same perks. The only major difference would be the fact that leveling up wouldn't give you the opportunity to get kits (therefore leveling up faster is purely cosmetic). We would also add more prestiges, along with more stars and other symbols to show off. 
Also, this would allow everyone to keep their current level that they worked hard to get. There would be no resetting levels, which is my ultimate goal seeing that people have put hours upon hours into getting their prestige 5.

Comment below whether you would like to keep leveling, or whether you would like for it to be tossed. Your opinions do count! So please be specific on what you want!

Thanks, 
Max
title: EULA Change: Experience/Leveling/Prestiging

replies.body:
Keep the leveling, of course; that's actually one of the things that keeps me coming back to the server. "I'll quit for the day after I level up once more in Nebula..."

And, even though I'm only a nominal first prestige, I'd love to see more added... preferably at least five more, as many players have been suggesting, bringing the total number to ten. Having a customizable prestige symbol seems like a pretty neat idea as well — you should definitely put that into consideration.

And, even though I'm only a nominal first prestige, I'd love to see more added... preferably at least five more, as many players have been suggesting, bringing the total number to ten. Having a customizable prestige symbol seems like a pretty neat idea as well — you should definitely put that into consideration.

replies.body:
Why don't we just take away the donor XP boost and make kits unlockable at a certain level again? There are lots of cool things donors could get besides that, too. 
I'm just pretty worried about not unlocking kits at a certain level.. You won't have that amazing rush of unlocking that one kit with TNT in it or have the motivation to play more to get the next fun kit. I understand that cosmetics can be fun, but taking away the leveling needed to get kits is, well.. not fun. 
I know I'm just one thought out of tons of people, but please think about it first :c

replies.body:
Not all kits will be available all of the time. Don't worry about that.

If we were to take away the donor bonus, then we would most likely reset levels completely because donors used their increase leveling to prestige quicker. We have an alternate system of unlocking kits being made.
